item.description: Lead Intelligence: Understanding your customer is key to engaging them and run effective campaigns. What if you could shorten your sales cycles and deliver relevant offers to prospects? Gain a clear picture of your prospects - who are they, what influences them, their interests & lifestyle profile - a ‚Äòmust-have‚Äô intelligence to foster product, service and feature innovation! Actionable Data: We capture user data from any device, across multiple locations, and from multiple devices.
